verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Go <S%H935><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> to him, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews, <S%H5680><s%> "Let <S%H7971><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> Me.
"For if <S%H518><s%> you refuse <S%H3986><s%> to let <S%H7971><s%> [them] go, <S%H7971><s%> and continue <S%H5750><s%> to hold <S%H2388><s%> them,

behold, <S%H2009><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will come <S%H1961><s%> [with] a very <S%H3966><s%> severe <S%H3515><s%> pestilence <S%H1698><s%> on your livestock <S%H4735><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are in the field, <S%H7704><s%> on the horses, <S%H5483><s%> on the donkeys, <S%H2543><s%> on the camels, <S%H1581><s%> on the herds, <S%H1241><s%> and on the flocks. <S%H6629><s%>

"But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will make <S%H6395><s%> a distinction <S%H6395><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the livestock <S%H4735><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the livestock <S%H4735><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> so that nothing <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1697><s%> will die <S%H4191><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> that belongs to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"' "

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> a definite <S%H4150><s%> time, <S%H4150><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>"

So the Lord <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> on the morrow, <S%H4283><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the livestock <S%H4735><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> died; <S%H4191><s%> but of the livestock <S%H4735><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> not one <S%H259><s%> died. <S%H4191><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> sent, <S%H7971><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> there was not even <S%H5704><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of the livestock <S%H4735><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> dead. <S%H4191><s%> But the heart <S%H3820><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> was hardened, <S%H3513><s%> and he did not let <S%H7971><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> go. <S%H7971><s%>

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> "Take <S%H3947><s%> for yourselves handfuls <S%H4393><s%> <S%H2651><s%> of soot <S%H6368><s%> from a kiln, <S%H3536><s%> and let Moses <S%H4872><s%> throw <S%H2236><s%> it toward the sky <S%H8064><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>

"And it will become <S%H1961><s%> fine dust <S%H80><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and will become <S%H1961><s%> boils <S%H7822><s%> breaking <S%H9457><s%> out with sores <S%H76><s%> on man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> through all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>"

So they took <S%H3947><s%> soot <S%H6368><s%> from a kiln, <S%H3536><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh; <S%H6547><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> threw <S%H2236><s%> it toward the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and it became <S%H1961><s%> boils <S%H7822><s%> breaking <S%H9457><s%> out with sores <S%H76><s%> on man <S%H120><s%> and beast. <S%H929><s%>

And the magicians <S%H2748><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the boils, <S%H7822><s%> for the boils <S%H7822><s%> were on the magicians <S%H2748><s%> as well as on all <S%H3605><s%> the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> Pharaoh's heart, <S%H3820><s%> and he did not listen <S%H8085><s%> to them, just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Rise <S%H7925><s%> up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> and stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to him, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews, <S%H5680><s%> "Let <S%H7971><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> Me.

"For this <S%H2088><s%> time <S%H6471><s%> I will send <S%H7971><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> My plagues <S%H4046><s%> on you and your servants <S%H5650><s%> and your people, <S%H5971><s%> so <S%H5668><s%> that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> Me in all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

"For [if by] now <S%H6258><s%> I had put <S%H7971><s%> forth <S%H7971><s%> My hand <S%H3027><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> you and your people <S%H5971><s%> with pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> you would then have been cut <S%H3582><s%> off <S%H3582><s%> from the earth. <S%H776><s%>

"But, indeed, <S%H199><s%> for this <S%H2088><s%> cause <S%H5668><s%> I have allowed you to remain, <S%H5975><s%> in order <S%H5668><s%> to show <S%H7200><s%> you My power, <S%H3581><s%> and in order <S%H4616><s%> to proclaim <S%H5608><s%> My name <S%H8034><s%> through all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
"Still <S%H5750><s%> you exalt <S%H5549><s%> yourself against My people <S%H5971><s%> by not letting <S%H7971><s%> them go. <S%H7971><s%>

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> about this time <S%H6256><s%> tomorrow, <S%H4279><s%> I will send <S%H4305><s%> a very <S%H3966><s%> heavy <S%H3515><s%> hail, <S%H1259><s%> such <S%H834><s%> as has not been <S%H1961><s%> [seen] in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> from the day <S%H3117><s%> it was founded <S%H3245><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> now. <S%H6258><s%>

"Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore send, <S%H7971><s%> bring <S%H5756><s%> your livestock <S%H4735><s%> and whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> you have in the field <S%H7704><s%> to safety. <S%H5756><s%> Every <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> that is found <S%H4672><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%> and is not brought <S%H622><s%> home, <S%H1004><s%> when the hail <S%H1259><s%> comes <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> on them, will die. <S%H4191><s%>"' "

The one <S%H4480><s%> among the servants <S%H5650><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> who feared <S%H3372><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> made his servants <S%H5650><s%> and his livestock <S%H4735><s%> flee <S%H5127><s%> into the houses; <S%H1004><s%>

but he who <S%H834><s%> paid <S%H7760><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> regard <S%H7760><s%> <S%H3820><s%> to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> left <S%H5800><s%> his servants <S%H5650><s%> and his livestock <S%H4735><s%> in the field. <S%H7704><s%>

Now the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Stretch <S%H5186><s%> out your hand <S%H3027><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> the sky, <S%H8064><s%> that hail <S%H1259><s%> may fall <S%H1961><s%> on all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> on man <S%H120><s%> and on beast <S%H929><s%> and on every <S%H3605><s%> plant <S%H6212><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> throughout the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>"

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched <S%H5186><s%> out his staff <S%H4294><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H5414><s%> thunder <S%H6963><s%> and hail, <S%H1259><s%> and fire <S%H784><s%> ran <S%H1980><s%> down to the earth. <S%H776><s%> And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> rained <S%H4305><s%> hail <S%H1259><s%> on the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

So there was hail, <S%H1259><s%> and fire <S%H784><s%> flashing <S%H3947><s%> continually in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the hail, <S%H1259><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> severe, <S%H3515><s%> such <S%H834><s%> as had not been <S%H1961><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> since <S%H9241><s%> it became <S%H1961><s%> a nation. <S%H1471><s%>

And the hail <S%H1259><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that was in the field <S%H7704><s%> through all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> both <S%H4480><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and beast; <S%H929><s%> the hail <S%H1259><s%> also struck <S%H5221><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> plant <S%H6212><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> and shattered <S%H7665><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> of the field. <S%H7704><s%>

Only <S%H7534><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen, <S%H1657><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> [were,] there was no <S%H3808><s%> hail. <S%H1259><s%>

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, "I have sinned <S%H2398><s%> this <S%H6471><s%> time; <S%H6471><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is the righteous <S%H6662><s%> one, <S%H6662><s%> and I and my people <S%H5971><s%> are the wicked <S%H7563><s%> ones. <S%H7563><s%>

"Make <S%H6279><s%> supplication <S%H6279><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for there has been enough <S%H7227><s%> of God's thunder <S%H6963><s%> and hail; <S%H1259><s%> and I will let <S%H7971><s%> you go, <S%H7971><s%> and you shall stay <S%H5975><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> longer. <S%H3254><s%>"

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "As soon as I go <S%H3318><s%> out of the city, <S%H5892><s%> I will spread <S%H6566><s%> out my hands <S%H3709><s%> to the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> the thunder <S%H6963><s%> will cease, <S%H2308><s%> and there will be hail <S%H1259><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> longer, <S%H5750><s%> that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that the earth <S%H776><s%> is the Lord's.
"But as for you and your servants, <S%H5650><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that you do not yet <S%H2962><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>"
(Now the flax <S%H6594><s%> and the barley <S%H8184><s%> were ruined, <S%H5221><s%> for the barley <S%H8184><s%> was in the ear <S%H24><s%> and the flax <S%H6594><s%> was in bud. <S%H1392><s%>
But the wheat <S%H2406><s%> and the spelt <S%H3698><s%> were not ruined, <S%H5221><s%> for they [ripen] late. <S%H648><s%>)

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%> from Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and spread <S%H6566><s%> out his hands <S%H3709><s%> to the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> and the thunder <S%H6963><s%> and the hail <S%H1259><s%> ceased, <S%H2308><s%> and rain <S%H4306><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> longer poured <S%H5413><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%>

But when Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the rain <S%H4306><s%> and the hail <S%H1259><s%> and the thunder <S%H6963><s%> had ceased, <S%H2308><s%> he sinned <S%H2398><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> and hardened <S%H3513><s%> his heart, <S%H3820><s%> he and his servants. <S%H5650><s%>

And Pharaoh's heart <S%H3820><s%> was hardened, <S%H2388><s%> and he did not let <S%H7971><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> through <S%H3027><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
